name: Dual Finance
intro: The next generation of sustainable structured products
introduce: Dual Finance is the next generation of sustainable structured products to re-incentivize Web3 communities. Dual Finance’s flagship product DIPs advance and improve the crypto market standard implementation of Decentralized Option Vaults (DOVs) or more accurately referred to here as Structured Product Pools (SPPs). Dual Finance is able to offer these products in a more competitive, capital-efficient, and risk neutral manner than any other SPP protocol via live streaming prices, rehypothecated collateral, and a novel staking offering.
